lead_paragraph: Rio de Janeiro's mayor said Thursday preparations for the Olympics will not be impacted by Brazil's political turbulence, and he guaranteed there was zero corruption in the city's projects for the games.

headline.print_headline: Rio Mayor Assures Olympics Not Impacted by Graft, Political Turmoil
headline.main: Rio Mayor Assures Olympics Not Impacted by Graft, Political Turmoil

snippet: Rio de Janeiro's mayor said Thursday preparations for the Olympics will not be impacted by Brazil's political turbulence, and he guaranteed there was zero corruption in the city's projects for the games....
